text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump The #MAGA crowd blames @BarackObama for the 12,000 dead during swine flu in one year
but applauds @realDonaldTrump for the 17,000 people dying of #covid19 in only 2 months

I DID NAZI THAT COMING

#Resist #CancelTrump #TrumpLiesPeopleDie #RacistMAGA
